a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Years lived with disease or disability vs. GDP per capita, 2021
Expected years living with disability or disease versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita, measured in
constant international-$ which correct for inflation and cross-country price differences.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024); World Bank (2023)
